name: The wild Quest in a grotesque Life
name_original: The wild Quest in a grotesque Life
description:
This is a 2D point and click adventure.

To MOVE AROUND you use the mouse. To INTERACT with your environment you also click on the objects or characters.

The INVENTORY can be opened with I. The ITEMS in the INVENTORY can be combined with each other or the world around you.

Credits:

Music and Sound effects are from epidemicsound.
